ing.item: Thin bread sticks about 8 inches long.

directions.step:
Dredge one side of each bacon strip in cheese, then roll it around a bread stick cheese-side in. Place all the sticks on a plate lined with paper towel. Microwave 4 - 5 1/2 minutes or until bacon begins to brown. Remove from oven and immediately roll in cheese.
These stay crisp for several hours after microwaving and are great with pasta dishes.
